function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"54% compliance with quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase compliance with quarantine measures, provide better support and incentives for quarantine","Technologies":"Incentive programs, tracking and monitoring technologies","People":"Population at risk, especially those not complying with quarantine measures","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Emotional and psychological issues associated with quarantine periods","Impact":"Increased mental health issues and psychological distress","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and interventions, improve communication and information dissemination","Technologies":"Telehealth services, online support groups","People":"Quarantined individuals, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective and unsustainable mitigation strategies in Western societies","Impact":"Less effective control of COVID-19, potential for multiple waves of transmission","Mitigation":"Develop tailored and sustainable mitigation strategies, improve public awareness of the importance of strict measures","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns, data-driven decision-making tools","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
